channel.title: Facebook on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on Praveen Lobo

item.title: A 21 Year Old Friendship
item.description: Krishnamurthy. He is my oldest friend. We were in same class in Bangalore for six years starting 1990 before I had to leave. We were not in touch and had not met more than a handful of times in the last fifteen years. Then when I met him, he was still the same! He had moved to a new place and before I knew it, he was gone from there. I tried to find him but in vain.

item.title: O_ops: Facebook Image Compression Sucks!
item.description: Facebook [profile picture] image compression not only sucks big time, but it is also stupid. I don’t use Facebook as an image storage service, neither do I care about the EXIF data that they strip. I’m also okay with their approach to compress each and every image(?), but compressing an image which results in an image size bigger than the originally uploaded image? I think it fits in my O_ops series.
